Quotex - easy to use, reliable trading platform with integrated chart scanner.
The Chart scanner is a tool that can help you determine the direction of a trend.

The result is displayed next to its name: a green indicator means the trend is going up, while red means down.

Identifying a trend can help you make decisions when trading. But unfortunately, all the indicators can produce false signals.
That's why it's essential to use different tools when trading.

The Chart scanner is a ready-to-use combination of seven different moving averages.
Each of them uses different calculations and periods to indicate the direction of a trend.

The Chart scanner shows you the result: the more of these signals there are, the stronger the trend and the more likely it is to continue. 

Remember: the state of the market can be very volatile, and the Chart scanner's advice does not guarantee successful results. So please be sure to make well-considered decisions when trading.
